text: "In The End" is a song by Linkin Park. It appeared on their first album, Hybrid Theory. It was the fourth single from the album. ==Positions on music charts== Music chart Highest position Billboard Hot 100 2 Modern Rock Tracks 1 Mainstream Rock Tracks 3 UK Top 40 8 Sweden 3 New Zealand 10 Austria 6 France 40 Netherlands 5 ==References== Category:Linkin Park songs Category:2001 songs
title: In the End
